Actions.Text: REFERENCE CHANGED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Requires a weigh-in to take place the day of a combative sports event
Summary: Requires a weigh-in of all participants shall occur on the date of a combative sports event.
LawCode: Add ยง1023, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring a weigh-in to take place the day of a combative sports event
